summary: BRAKE PADS WEAR OUT PREMATURELY.  A/C ONLY WORKS ON HIGH.  HAVE HAD TO REPLACE BRAKE PADS 3 TIMES OVER A PERIOD OF 5 MONTHS.  MECHANIC MENTIONED THAT GMC IS AWARE OF THE BRAKE WEAR PROBLEM AND OFFERS VARIOUS SOLUTIONS.  NONE OF WHICH WORK.  WHY IS THIS ISSUE NOT MADE CLEAR WHEN PURCHASING THE VEHICLE!  *TR
